_source.text: According to the New York Times and the Asian Wall Street Journal, Apple initially said that the ad was being pulled because the company wanted to depict someone better known in the region than the Dalai Lama -- a comment that apparently was met with skepticism given that the Asian ad campaign will feature a photo of US aviator Amelia Earhart, whose plane disappeared in the Pacific Ocean in 1937.
